name: cerb.editor.toolbar.markdownLink
script:
start:
  await:
    form:
      elements:
        text/prompt_url:
          label: URL:
          required@bool: yes
          type: url
          placeholder: https://example.com/
        text/prompt_label:
          label: Label:
          type: freeform
          default: {{caller_params.selected_text}}
  
  return:
    snippet@text,trim:
      {% if prompt_label %}
      [{{prompt_label}}]({{prompt_url}})
      {% else %}
      <{{prompt_url}}>
      {% endif %}
